category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Baseline_omitted_occurrence_types
preference.preference_description: Determines which BOM lines display when building a manufacturing baseline. BOM lines containing occurrence notes defined in this preference are omitted.Manufacturing baselines are a convenient method of releasing composition/process structures whose contents do not change over time. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values; each string must be a valid occurrence type.
